purpleculture_pinyin:
ruì
acute
острый
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 锐)
Antonyms: 鈍
Pictophonetic: 兌 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
銳氣 [ ruì qì ]: acute spirit; dash; drive
銳利 [ ruì lì ]: sharp; keen; acute; incisive; penetrating; perceptive
銳意 [ ruì yì ]: acute determination; dauntless
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 兌 [ duì ] cash, check; to exchange
heisig_chinese_memo: The metal devil has sharp everything... nails, shoulders, elbows, knees, hair, head, etc.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the eight elder brothers (兌) with gold (金) must be sharp
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The devil is a big fan of metal but only if it's sharp.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " gold " to " redemption " sound. The text refers to the sharp point of the grass, and the extension means sharpness. "Shuowen": "Sharp, mang also. From gold, duisheng." Duan Yucai's note: "mang person, 艸耑 also. 艸耑 must be long, so the extension is the word mang angle. Interpretation II: "Sharp, Li also." Such as "Zhuangzi. "World": "Strong will be destroyed, sharp will be frustrated." "Huainanzi. Shi Ze": "Soft but not rigid, sharp but not frustrated." Gao You's note: "Sharp, sharp."

" Sharp " also means a sharp weapon. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Chu Ceyi": "I was stubborn and sharp, and went to a strong enemy to die." "Historical Records. "Chen She Family": "The general has been stubbornly stubborn, cuts down on innocence, punishes the Qin, and reestablishes the state of Chu, and his merit is king."

" Sharp " means sharp, that is, the bottom is large and the top is small. Such as "Grandson. Marching: "The dust is high and sharp, the car comes." Du Mu's note: "The car and horse are fast, but still have to file, so the dust is high and sharp." "Han Shu. "Astronomical Chronicles": "There are three stars at the bottom, sharp, called punishment, it is to cut wormwood." Yan Shigu quoted Meng Kang as saying: "The upper is small, the lower is big, so it is sharp." It also refers to the small. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Sixteenth Year of Zhaogong": "And I use jade to guilty, not also sharp!" Du's note: "Sharp, small." "Jia sin" means to incur guilt.

" Sharp " means excellent and elite. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Ceyi": "Even before the king of Chu, the three Jin Dynasty blind date and strong each other, came out of the sharp division to defeat Han and Liangxi." "Han. "Criminal Law History": "Qin Zhao wins with sharp soldiers." Yan Shigu's note: "Sharp, brave." It also refers specifically to elite troops. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Lai She Chuan": "(Kai) clamored to attack it, from spring to autumn, his soldiers were exhausted."

" Sharp " by extension means shrewdness and sensitivity. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Eleven Years of Aigong": "Zi Yu is sharp and sensitive." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Yao Ang Chao Cuo": "Chao Cuo is keen to think for the country without seeing any harm."

" Sharp " also means fast. Such as "Mencius. Do your best": "The one who advances and retreats." It also refers to eagerness. Such as "Han Shu. Huainan Hengshan Jibei King's Biography: "So Wang Rui wanted to go, so he sent officials and slaves into the palace to be the emperor's seal."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " gold " to the sound of " red ". The text refers to the sharp point of the grass, and the extension means sharpness.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「兌」聲。本指草端尖細之處，引申表示銳利之意。《說文》：「銳，芒也。从金，兌聲。」段玉裁注：「芒者，艸耑也。艸耑必鑯，故引申為芒角字。」又《廣雅．釋詁二》：「銳，利也。」如《莊子．天下》：「堅則毀矣，銳則挫矣。」《淮南子．時則》：「柔而不剛，銳而不挫。」高誘注：「銳，利也。」

　　「銳」也表示銳利的兵器。如《戰國策．楚策一》：「吾被堅執銳，赴強敵而死。」《史記．陳涉世家》：「將軍身被堅執銳，伐無道，誅暴秦，復立楚國之社稷，功宜為王。」

　　「銳」表示尖銳，即底部大頂部小。如《孫子．行軍》：「塵高而銳者，車來也。」杜牧注：「車馬行疾，仍須魚貫，故塵高而尖。」《漢書．天文志》：「下有三星，銳，曰罰，為斬艾事。」顏師古注引孟康曰：「上小下大，故曰銳。」又指細小。如《左傳．昭公十六年》：「且吾以玉賈罪，不亦銳乎！」杜預注：「銳，細小也。」「賈罪」意謂招致罪責。

　　「銳」表示精良、精銳。如《戰國策．趙策一》：「及楚王之未入也，三晉相親相堅，出銳師以戍韓、梁西邊。」《漢書．刑法志》：「秦昭以銳士勝。」顏師古注：「銳，勇利。」又特指精銳的部隊。如《後漢書．來歙傳》：「（隗）囂盡銳攻之，自春至秋，其士卒疲弊。」

　　「銳」引申表示精明、靈敏。如《左傳．哀公十一年》：「子羽銳敏。」《漢書．爰盎晁錯傳》：「晁錯銳於為國遠慮，而不見身害。」

　　「銳」還表示快速。如《孟子．盡心上》：「其進銳者其退速。」又指急切。如《漢書．淮南衡山濟北王傳》：「於是王銳欲發，乃令官奴入宮中，作皇帝璽。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「兌」聲。本指草端尖細之處，引申表示銳利之意。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
銳 (Simplified: 锐)
Pinyin: ruì
English Definition: acute
Antonyms: 鈍
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 金
Pictophonetic: 兌 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 兌 [ duì ] cash, check; to exchange
Example Words:
銳氣 [ ruì qì ]: acute spirit; dash; drive
銳利 [ ruì lì ]: sharp; keen; acute; incisive; penetrating; perceptive
銳意 [ ruì yì ]: acute determination; dauntless
More: 銳* | *銳 | *銳*

rui4
HSK 6: 锐,銳
(Simplified: 锐)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 鈍
Pictophonetic: 兌 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 兌 [ duì ] cash, check; to exchange
①鋒利，尖，與“鈍”相對：銳利。銳不可當。
②感覺靈敏：敏銳。
③勇往直前的氣勢：銳意進取。養精蓄銳。
④精良：精銳。
⑤驟，急劇：銳減，銳增。
銳氣 [ ruì qì ]: acute spirit; dash; drive
銳利 [ ruì lì ]: sharp; keen; acute; incisive; penetrating; perceptive
銳意 [ ruì yì ]: acute determination; dauntless
(Simplified: 锐)

Pictophonetic: 兌 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.

Meaning: sharp
Hanzi: 锐
Story: The devil is a big fan of metal but only if it's sharp.
Kind: traditional

銳字的基本解释

銳
ruì
同“鋭”。

銳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruì］
“鋭1”的旧字形。
[②]［duì］
“鋭2”的旧字形。
[③]［yuè］
“鋭3”的旧字形。

銳字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第03
【唐韻】以芮切【集韻】【韻會】俞芮切【正韻】于芮切，?音叡。【說文】芒也。　又【書·顧命】一人冕執銳。【傳】銳，矛屬也。【釋文】銳，以稅反。又【左傳·成二年】銳司徒免乎。【註】銳司徒，主銳兵者。【釋文】銳，悅歲反。　又【廣韻】利也。【史記·武安侯傳】魏其銳身爲救灌夫。【前漢·淮南王傳】於是王銳欲發。【註】王意欲發兵，如鋒刃之銳利。又【劉向·說苑】哀公問取人。孔子對曰：毋取口銳。口銳者，多誕寡信。　又【左傳·哀十一年】子羽銳敏。【註】銳，精也。【桓十一年】我以銳師，宵加於鄖。【王褒·講德論】各采精銳，以貢忠誠。　又【正字通】今凡物鑯利曰銳。【前漢·天文志】下有三星銳，曰罰。【註】上小下大，故曰銳。【爾雅·釋丘】再成銳上爲融丘。【註】纖項者。【釋文】唯歲反。又【釋山】銳而高嶠。【疏】銳，鑯也，言山形鑯峻而高者，名嶠。　又【正韻】細小也。【左傳·昭十六年】且吾以玉賈罪，不亦銳乎。【註】銳，細小也。【疏】銳是鋒鋩。【釋文】銳，悅歲反。　又姓。【姓苑】升

銳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
銳字的起名意思

暂无。

sharp
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Rui; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1306 No. 03
[Tang Yun] Yi Ruiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Ruiqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Ruiqie,? Yin Rui. [Said the text] Mang also.　[Book·Gu Ming] One person Mian Zhi Rui. [Biography] Sharp, spear belongs to also. [Explanation] Rui, anti-tax. Also [Zuo Zhuan·Two Years] Rui Situ is almost free. [Note] Rui Situ is the master of sharp soldiers. [Explanation] Rui, Yue Sui reverse.　[Guang Yun] Li Ye. 【Historical Records·Wu'an Hou Chuan】Wei Qirui was a rescuer. [Previous Han·Huainan Wang Biography] So Wang Rui wanted to go. [Note] The king intends to send troops, as sharp as a blade. Also【Liu Xiang·Shuoyuan】Ai Gong asked and picked people. Confucius replied: Don't be sharp. Those who are sharp-mouthed have many births and few believers.　[Zuo Zhuan·Ai 11 years] Zi Yu is sharp and sensitive. [Note] Sharp, fine. [Huan eleven years] I used a sharp teacher, and I added to Yun at night. 【Wang Bao·Speaking of Morality】Each of them is talented and loyal with tribute.　[Zhengzitong] Nowadays Tan Li said Rui. [Previous Han·Astronomy] There is a three-star sharp underneath, and he said punishment. [Note] The upper part is small and the lower part is big, so it is called sharp. 【Erya·Shiqiu】Rongqiu becomes Rongqiu again. [Note] Those who are slim. 【Explanation】Only the age is reversed. And [Shi Shan] sharp and high ridge. 【Sparse】Rui, Tanya, Yanshan shape is steep and tall, and the name is Qiao.　[Zheng Yun] It’s also small. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteenth Year of Zhao] And I use jade to guilty, not also sharp. [Note] Sharp, small. 【Sparse】Rui is the front line. [Explanation] Rui, Yue Sui reverse.　Another last name. 【Last Name】Sheng
